}} 'The Store' (also known as 'The Store with JML') is a strand of shopping
programming on ITV, ITV3 and ITV4. Dubbed the "chatmercial", The Store combines
the format of a chatshow with home TV shopping in front of a studio
audience.

Sarah Heaney presents the strand, with help from experts including celebrity
make-up artist Jerome Alexander, fashion expert Wendy Elsmore and celebrity
chef Tony Tobin.

The strand is shown usually between the hours of 12:30 am â
02:30 am on Saturday and Sunday nights on ITV, however times are flexible
around schedule but the show is almost always on air for two hours. As well as
the weekend broadcasts, the stand also airs Mondays to Fridays on ITV Channel
Television, in place of Jackpot247, which cannot broadcast on the Islands for
legal reasons. The overnight strand is not broadcast on STV (Central and North
Scotland) or UTV (Northern Ireland).

The Store airs every weekday morning on ITV3 between 09:00 and 10:00, and on
ITV4 every night from around 02:00.
